channel.title: [pi] set spec
channel.description: I currently have a command to set my own spec to 5000% but I want to know how to make a command to set other people's special bars.

item.title: [pi] set spec
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:

import hint hint.

[/quote]
Yeah I just realised it xD[/quote]
Does it work?

item.title: [pi] set spec
item.dc:creator: @mrpyro3 mrpyro3
item.description:
@mrpyro3 wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:2, topic:406631”] if(playerCommand.equals("otherspec")) { for (final Player player : PlayerHandler.players) { if (player != null) { final Client c2 = (Client) player; c2.specAmount = #; // Spec amount here c2.getItems().updateSpecialBar(); } } }

I’m not 100% that this will work. I just wrote it out quick.[/quote]
src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:466: cannot find symbol
symbol : class Player
location: class server.model.players.packets.Commands
for (final Player player : PlayerHandler.players) {
^
Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] set spec
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

		if(playerCommand.equals("otherspec")) {
		for (final Player player : PlayerHandler.players) {
			if (player != null) {
				final Client c2 = (Client) player;
				c2.specAmount = #; // Spec amount here
				c2.getItems().updateSpecialBar();
			}
		}
        }

I’m not 100% that this will work. I just wrote it out quick.

Read full topic
